short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically scroll a page smoothly by pressing the "s" key

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Scroll down a webpage at a smooth pace with the press of a button.
Great for recording product/site demos or skimming a webpage. 

Press "S" to scroll.

Press "A" to scroll slowly
Press "D" to scroll fast

Press again to stop.
